subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The outspoken Mark Cavendish and the embattled Alberto Contador, who is awaiting a final ruling on a doping test, will command most of the attention at the first Grand Tour of the season.
snippet: The outspoken Mark Cavendish and the embattled Alberto Contador, who is awaiting a final ruling on a doping test, will command most of the attention at the first Grand Tour of the season.
